item.title: An Ode to Vim (by ChatGPT)
item.description: Some time ago, when ChatGPT was still quite new, I asked it to write a poem about vim. The prompt was as follows: Can you also write me a poem about vim in the style of Shakespeare? The result was amusing enough for me to share it here. Hope you enjoy. Of Vim, that editor of text so great, I’ll sing a song of high estate. With keystrokes deft and motions quick, It doth make all our coding slick.
